alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fort Bend and south central Harris Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 415 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West University Place. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Brief heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Pasadena, Sugar Land, Missouri City, eastern Rosenberg, Stafford, Bellaire, West University Place, Richmond, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Downtown Houston, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Second Ward, Greater Heights, Mission Bend, Neartown / Montrose, Pecan Grove, Memorial Park and Fourth Ward. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Brief heavy downpours were also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized urban or poor drainage flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
